nodes.documentation:
@author Rutwik , Yashwanth , Sunil and Manikanta
@title Implementation of the Auction(to place,reveal bids and transfer the ether to the seller)
nodes.name: Auction
PlaceBid
RevealBid
TransferEther

devdoc.author: Rutwik , Yashwanth , Sunil and Manikanta

PlaceBid(bytes32).details: the bid should be placed before the end of the bidding period

params.HashValue: have the hash value of the bid being placed

RevealBid(uint256,uint256).details: reveal the bids in the duration of the revealing period

params.BidAmount: has the value of the amount bidded

RevealingTimeRemaining().details: check the time is valid to reveal bids(it's in revealind duration)

params.amount: has the value of ether that is going to be transferred
params.receiver: has the address of the person that receive the amount paid

devdoc.title: Implementation of the Auction(to place,reveal bids and transfer the ether to the seller)

BiddingTimeRemaining().notice: Function to calculate the time remaining for the bidding

RevealingTimeRemaining().notice: Function to calculate the time remaining before revealing the bids
